comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See for info on Mrs.Belmont and Miss Kennedy. NYT of May 1, 1912 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10F14FC3E5813738... reports on the wedding of Miss Anne Adelaide Stearns to Stephen Peabody, Jr.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: New-York Tribune., June 13, 1915, Page 6, chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-06-13/ed-... has a compatible photo of Mrs. Stephen Peabody, Jr. By June 1921, the Evening Public Ledger indicated they were divorced and she was remarried, to Edgar A. Eyre. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045211/1921-06-27/ed-... The divorce was in 1918 according to The [New York] Sun., April 07, 1918, Page 16 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030431/1918-04-07/ed-...
